title: Myra Hess
brief_description: Dame Myra Hess plays the first movement of Beethoven’s Sonata in F Minor, Opus 57, (Apassionata). Close-ups show the technique of this artist, whose finest quality as a pianist is her sincerity and who was the inspiration of lunchtime concerts during the war in the National Gallery, London.
